page.title: 10THE LOCAL SHOP
page.content: RODDINGTON STORES IS THE LOCAL SHOP AND POST OFFICE. IT WAS BUILT IN 1926 AND THE SHOP AREA IS TWICE AS BIG NOW AS IT WAS THEN. THE GREATER PART OF THE BUILDING IS THE SHOPKEEPER'S HOME. THE SHOP OPENS FROM 8 A.M. TILL 6 P.M. DAILY EXCEPT SUNDAY, WHEN IT IS CLOSED ALL DAY, AND THURSDAY WHEN IT CLOSES AT 12.30 P.M. THE VILLAGE SHOP SELLS JUST ABOUT EVERYTHING. YOU WALK IN AND YOU ARE MET WITH A COLOURFUL SELECTION OF SWEETS, CAKES, POP, CHOCOLATES, NEWSPAPERS AND MAGAZINES. STRAIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU IS THE POST OFFICE COUNTER. TO THE LEFT OF YOU IS THE MAIN COUNTER AND TO THE RIGHT OF YOU IS THE AREA OF THE SHOP WHICH IS DEVOTED TO SELF-SERVICE ITEMS. THE SHOP STOCKS A VAST RANGE OF ITEMS FROM CAT FOOD AND CLEANERS TO BOTTLES OF VINEGAR AND VEGETABLES.
